UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Enhanced cell selectivity of hybrid peptides with potential antimicrobial activity and immunomodulatory effect.
Literature.Author: Miao X, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=250 µM,Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=500 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 8600(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=259.5µM)
